programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A matchmaker risks falling for a real-life prince before his royal wedding date.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie discovers love in London days before leaving for the US. Fate reunites them six years later.

programme.title: Best Friend From Heaven
programme.desc: When her dog is killed, Tara cancels her wedding. But her dog's ghost and her small town have a surprise.

programme.title: A Mother's Sacrifice
programme.desc: A mother fear that her daughter has been abducted when a phone call is interrupted by something suspicious.

programme.title: Eve's Christmas
programme.desc: A wealthy and successful career woman gets a second chance in life when a magical wish transports her back in time eight years to when she walked away from her fiance to lead a business life in New York.

programme.title: Holiday High School Reunion
programme.desc: Returning home for Christmas, a woman develops an unexpected attraction to her best friend from school.

programme.title: A Firehouse Christmas (aka A Christmas Hero)
programme.desc: Firefighter Jenny has fallen in love with Tom. However his ex-wife Mary demands a reconciliation if he wants to see his daughter at Christmas.

programme.title: Hearts & Vines
programme.desc: A builder and decorator on a home renovation show end up quarantined during the holidays in the home they are renovating.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori is cooking for girls night and must figure out how to please both of her friends!

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: American vlogger lands role in British 'Pride and Prejudice' film, faces challenge mastering the accent.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: Lindsay and Will bond after agreeing the dating service that matched them has made a mistake.

programme.title: With Love, Your Sweetly Salted
programme.desc: Critic Alison goes undercover at a restaurant she slated, but ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Corrupt
programme.desc: A district attorney asks a forensic accountant (Nicole de Boer) to investigate the murder of a key witness.

programme.title: Blue Moon Ball
programme.desc: A writer returns to her hometown for inspiration and reinkindles her romance with her first love.

programme.title: Sword Of Lancelot
programme.desc: Lancelot is King Arthur's most valued Knight of the Round Table and a paragon of courage and virtue. Things change, however, when he falls in love with Queen Guinevere.

programme.title: Mad Dog Morgan
programme.desc: The true story of Irish outlaw Daniel Morgan, who is wanted, dead or alive, in Australia during the 1850s.

programme.title: Chino
programme.desc: Valdez is a loner horse breeder living in the Old West who falls in love with a girl but faces trouble from her brother when he finds out about the relationship.

programme.title: Iron Finger
programme.desc: Tough cop Bruce Li arrives back in town in time to investigate a series of odd murders. Victims have two pierce marks on their necks. The killer is an expert in the Iron Finger strike. The fights are fantastic with the two Bruce's and Ku Feng going at it and all are excellent.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Willie Parker has betrayed his former 'colleagues' and now lives in Spain, where he thinks he can hide from their vengeance. But one day, ten years later, two hitmen show up and he must face the music.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Percy Jones, a proud African American man, gets the shock of his life when he learns that his daughter Theresa's fiance is a Caucasian man.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

credits.actor: Christina Ricci,James McAvoy,Catherine O'Hara,Peter Dinklage,Richard E. Grant,Reese Witherspoon,Simon Woods,Ronni Ancona,Michael Feast,Nigel Havers,Lenny Henry,Christina Greatrex

programme.title: Serena
programme.desc: George, a successful timber baron, marries Serena, a smart and beautiful girl. However, when Serena starts manipulating George's business decisions, his life turns upside down.

credits.actor: Jennifer Lawrence,Bradley Cooper,Toby Jones,Rhys Ifans,David Dencik,Ana Ularu,Sean Harris,Sam Reid,Conleth Hill,Charity Wakefield,Douglas Hodge,Christian McKay,Philip Zandn,Ned Dennehy

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: To find her independence outside the White House, Samantha Mackenzie, daughter of the US President, leaves for college and falls in love with a student who is hiding a secret.

credits.actor: Katie Holmes,Marc Blucas,Amerie Rogers,Margaret Colin,Lela Rochon,Michael Keaton,Michael Milhoan,Dwayne Adway,Hollis Hill,Ken Moreno,Andrew Caple-Shaw

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

credits.actor: Steve Carell,Toni Collette,Allison Janney,AnnaSophia Robb,Sam Rockwell,Maya Rudolph,Liam James,Rob Corddry,Amanda Peet,River Alexander,Zoe Levin,Nat Faxon,Jim Rash,Adam Riegler,Jeffery Ryan

programme.title: Empire Records
programme.desc: A group of misfits who work at a small, independent record shop help their manager collect money to buy the enterprise. However, they discover kinship while also trying to fight off a corporate giant.

credits.actor: Anthony LaPaglia,Rory Cochrane,Johnny Whitworth,Liv Tyler,Rene Zellweger,Robin Tunney,Ethan Randall,Maxwell Caulfield,Debi Mazar,Coyote Shivers,Brendan Sexton,Ben Bode,James \"Kimo\" Wills,Kimber Monroe,Julia Howard

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

credits.actor: Michael Douglas,Diane Keaton,Sterling Jerins,Frances Sternhagen,Maurice Jones,Andy Karl,Austin Lysy,Annie Parisse,Scott Shepherd,Frankie Valli,Michael Terra,Sawyer Tanner Simpkins,Maxwell Simpkins,Luke Robertson,Meryl Williams,Rob Reiner

programme.title: Thelma \u0026 Louise
programme.desc: Docile housewife Thelma accompanies her friend Louise on a brief fishing trip. However, when Louise kills a man who attempts to rape Thelma, the two become fugitives of the law.

credits.actor: Susan Sarandon,Geena Davis,Harvey Keitel,Michael Madsen,Christopher McDonald,Brad Pitt,Stephen Tobolowsky,Timothy Carhart

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

credits.actor: Adam Sandler,Drew Barrymore,Rob Schneider,Sean Astin,Lusia Strus,Blake Clark,Dan Aykroyd,Amy Hill,Allen Covert,Maya Rudolph,Kevin James

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: After suffering from memory loss, a soldier returns to his former profession as a barber and attempts to escape persecution by the military forces.

programme.title: The Circus
programme.desc: The Tramp is hired by the proprietor of a circus after he stumbles into the middle of a performance and becomes the star attraction. He ends up falling in love with a horse rider.

credits.actor: Charlie Chaplin,Merna Kennedy,Allan Garcia,Harry Crocker,Stanley Sanford,John Rand,George Davis,Henry Bergman,Steve Murphy,Betty Morrissey,Tiny Sandford

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

credits.actor: Charles Chaplin,Mack Swain,Tom Murray,Georgia Hale,Betty Morrissey,Kay Deslys,Joan Lowell,Malcolm Waite,Henry Bergman,John Rand,Heinie Conklin,Albert Austin,Al Ernest Garcia,Tom Wood
